transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	path_file as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'files',
	fileName: 'df2.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ';',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	qutoChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> archivo
archivo derive(codigo_local_cadena = toString(byName('codigo_local_cadena')),
		sku_cadena = toString(byName('sku_cadena')),
		descripcion = toString(byName('descripcion')),
		venta_clp_dia = toString(byName('venta_clp_dia')),
		venta_unidades_dia = toString(byName('venta_unidades_dia')),
		stock = toString(byName('stock')),
		account = toString(byName('account')),
		year = toString(byName('year')),
		week = toString(byName('week')),
		weekday = toString(byName('weekday')),
		venta_costo = toString(byName('venta_costo')),
		text_extra_1 = toString(byName('text_extra_1')),
		text_extra_2 = toString(byName('text_extra_2')),
		text_extra_3 = toString(byName('text_extra_3')),
		num_extra_1 = toString(byName('num_extra_1')),
		num_extra_2 = toString(byName('num_extra_2')),
		num_extra_3 = toString(byName('num_extra_3')),
		timestamp = toString(byName('timestamp')),
		cliente = toString(byName('cliente')),
		fecha = toString(byName('fecha')),
		cadena = toString(byName('cadena'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 aggregate(groupBy(cadena),
	cadena_count = count()) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['archivojson'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
